profileAlternative.name: Pratiksha Choudhury
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer at Apple
profileAlternative.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the DevOps and build engineering field. Skilled in CI/CD, Makefile, clang, Linux, MongoDB, Python (Programming Language), Maven, and Virtualization. Strong engineering professional with a Master’s Degree focused in Software Engineering from San Jose State University.

After training, I was actively involved in the development and maintenance of iTrade, a trading portal for a Bank, developed by Infosys. iTrade is based on trading, share marketing and cash management.
